Title: Charles-Hubert Paris 3599-B Stainless Steel Quartz Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris 3599-B Stainless Steel Quartz Pocket Watch Features: Stainless steel 47mm hunter case with a matching curb chainBlack dial with date displaySwiss parts quartz movementDeluxe gift box Product Details: Product Dimensions: 0.6 x 0.6 x 0.6 inchesShipping Weight: 7.2 ouncesItem model number: 3599-BDomestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More Description Quartz movement, Dress pocket watch, Charles Hubert's Premium Collection, Silver-tone luminous hands, Silver-tone numbers, Analog date display, Polished stainless steel bezel, crown and caseback, Polished stainless steel case cover is etched with Crest Perfect for engraving, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Stainless Steel Quartz Pocket Watch 3599-B combines an etched crest design on its front cover and rich black dial with the cool elegance of silver-tone stainless steel construction. This well-made pocket watch has silver-tone Arabic numerals and hands, as well as a date display at three o'clock. Quartz movement provides reliability, while a matching curb chain lends real retro appeal. Designed to last a lifetime, this Charles-Hubert original arrives in a deluxe blue giftbox.
